description: Final Fantasy Tactics A2 is a game

0.0.1.description:
### Features:
- Quest order randomization.
- Job unlock options (vanilla, all locked/unlocked, job items).
- Intro cutscenes and tutorial are skipped and the map is (almost) fully unlocked.
- You can have multiple gate paths and choose how many paths are required to unlock the final quest.
- Options for ap,  exp, and gil rewards from quests.

### Things to know:
- Gate items are just loot items in the game. They can be sold or discarded. Don't do that.
- Items that belong to other players currently show up as "-".
- There is no in-game notification when receiving items from other players. Items are only received when on the map

### Major issues:
- Auction House softlocks (avoidable, just don't enter)
- Some quests may be in unreachable locations on the map (unavoidable, let me know which quests so I can move them)

### Minor issues:
- Story quests are broken due to story progress reliance (removed from the pool)
- Rewards are visible in the pub
- Gate items can currently be used in bazaar recipes
0.0.1.title: Final Fantasy Tactics A2 APworld 0.0.1

0.0.2.description:
### New Features:
- Recruits and random clan battles now show up on the map for 5 days every 20 days.
- _Clan Mates_ will also be available in the pub for 5 days every 20 days.
- Added an option to start the final questline at _The Ritual_ instead of _The Two Grimoires_.
0.0.2.title: Final Fantasy Tactics A2 APworld 0.0.2

0.0.3.description:
### New Features:
- Added an option to balance quests by quest rank and gate.  Lower rank quests in early gates, higher rank quests in late gates.
- Added an option that sets your starting units.
0.0.3.title: Final Fantasy Tactics A2 APworld 0.0.3

0.0.4.description:
### New Features:
- Added options for randomizing starting units and equipment.
- Added an option to remove loot from the pool of checks since the bazaar is not very useful currently.
- Removed some "Wanted:" quests from the pool.
0.0.4.title: Final Fantasy Tactics A2 APworld 0.0.4

0.0.5.description:
### New Features:
- All regions on the world map are visible from the start. They still count as unexplored so they cannot be walked past until entered once.
- All areas in each region are unlocked. All quests should be reachable now. Quests that were previously moved out of locked locations have been moved back.

### Fixes:
- Fixed a bug with the _job_unlock_req_ option that caused units with status effects to have a 0% chance of being hit by most effects.
- Removed some dispatch quests and some broken quests from the pool.
- Fixed the _gate_balancing_ option's weight calculation. It was slightly off from what was intended.
0.0.5.title: Final Fantasy Tactics A2 APworld 0.0.5

0.0.6.description:
### New Features:
- New options for the Bazaar. The new options randomize the recipes and optionally turns every recipe into a check (adding 355 extra checks to the game).
- The bazaar_loot_pool option sets how many different items will be used for Bazaar recipe when randomized. If set too high there's a chance of causing fill errors when generating due to restricting the logic.


### Fixes:
- Al-Cid's job and race will no longer be randomized.
0.0.6.title: Final Fantasy Tactics A2 APworld 0.0.6

0.0.7.description:
### New Features:
- Max quest rewards is now 4
- Archipelago and Job Unlock items now have custom icons and names

### Fixes:
- Removed some broken quests from the pool.
- Job Unlock Items are now compatible with Bazaar Checks
0.0.7.title: Final Fantasy Tactics A2 APworld 0.0.7

0.0.8.description:
### Fixes:
- Fixed guaranteed crash after completing a quest if bazaar checks are enabled
0.0.8.title: Final Fantasy Tactics A2 APworld 0.0.8

FFTA2_0.0.9.description:
# Features:
- Support for Universal Tracker (mainly useful for seeing which path quests belong to)
- Moved `The Two Grimoires` to the same location as `The Ritual` when set as the final quest instead of Targ Woods

# Fixes:
- Removed the following quests:
  - `Wanted: Assistant`
  - `Wanted: Caretaker`
  - `Survey No. 261`
  - `Rude Awakening`
  - `All Good Things...`
- No longer generates a `.puml` file when generating (leftover from debugging since the first release)
- More efficient list concatenation when loading the world (Thanks to Eijebong for pointing this out)
- Fixed display name of `quest_gil` option (was copied from quest_exp)
- Fixed valid keys for `starting_units`
FFTA2_0.0.9.title: Final Fantasy Tactics A2 APworld 0.0.9
